javadoc:
Container object to keep a relative index, label, and comments. Used
 in a list for copying/pasting labels and comments from one program to
 another.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: index
params.comment:
relative index added to a base address
 for where this information will be placed

methods.javadoc: Set the symbols to be transferred.
methods.name: setSymbols
methods.comment: Set the symbols to be transferred.

methods.name: setComment
methods.comment: Set the comment to be transferred.

params.name: commentType
params.comment:
CodeUnit.PRE_COMMENT, POST_COMMENT, 
 PLATE_COMMENT, EOL_COMMENT, or REPEATABLE.

methods.javadoc:
Set the function info.
@param function function used to get function info to transfer
methods.name: setFunction

params.name: function
params.comment: function used to get function info to transfer

methods.javadoc: Get the relative index for this CodeUnitInfo to add to a base address.
methods.name: getIndex
methods.comment: Get the relative index for this CodeUnitInfo to add to a base address.

methods.javadoc: Return whether this CodeUnitInfo has symbols to copy.
methods.name: hasSymbols
methods.comment: Return whether this CodeUnitInfo has symbols to copy.

methods.javadoc: Return whether this CodeUnitInfo has a dynamic symbol.
methods.name: hasDynamicSymbol
methods.comment: Return whether this CodeUnitInfo has a dynamic symbol.

methods.javadoc: Get the label; may be null.
methods.name: getPrimarySymbolName
methods.comment: Get the label; may be null.

methods.javadoc: Get the label source
methods.name: getPrimarySymbolSource

methods.javadoc: Is primary symbol in a function scope
methods.name: isPrimarySymbolInFunctionScope
methods.comment: Is primary symbol in a function scope

methods.javadoc: Get the names of the function scope symbols.
methods.name: getFunctionScopeSymbolNames
methods.comment: Get the names of the function scope symbols.

methods.javadoc: Get the sources of the function scope symbols.
methods.name: getFunctionScopeSymbolSources
methods.comment: Get the sources of the function scope symbols.

methods.javadoc: Get the names of the other symbols not in a function scope.
methods.name: getOtherSymbolNames
methods.comment: Get the names of the other symbols not in a function scope.

methods.javadoc: Get the sources of the other symbols not in a function scope.
methods.name: getOtherSymbolSources
methods.comment: Get the sources of the other symbols not in a function scope.

methods.javadoc: Get the plate comment.
methods.name: getPlateComment

methods.javadoc: Get the pre comment.
methods.name: getPreComment

methods.javadoc: Get the post comment.
methods.name: getPostComment

methods.javadoc: Get the EOL comment.
methods.name: getEOLComment

methods.javadoc: Get the repeatable comment.
methods.name: getRepeatableComment

methods.javadoc: Get the function name.
methods.name: getFunctionName

methods.javadoc: Get the function comments.
methods.name: getFunctionComments

methods.javadoc: Get the stack variable names.
methods.name: getStackVariableNames

methods.javadoc: Get the stack variable sources.
methods.name: getStackVariableSources

methods.javadoc: Get the stack offsets.
methods.name: getStackOffsets

methods.javadoc: Get the stack variable "First Use Offsets"
methods.name: getStackVarFirstUseOffsets
methods.comment: Get the stack variable "First Use Offsets"

methods.javadoc: Get the stack variable comments.
methods.name: getStackVariableComments

methods.javadoc: Get the non-stack variable names.
methods.name: getVariableNames

methods.javadoc: Get the non-stack variable sources.
methods.name: getVariableSources

methods.javadoc: Get the storage addresses corresponding to each non-stack variable.
methods.name: getVarAddresses
methods.comment: Get the storage addresses corresponding to each non-stack variable.

methods.javadoc: Get the non-stack variable "First Use Offsets"
methods.name: getVarFirstUseOffsets
methods.comment: Get the non-stack variable "First Use Offsets"

methods.javadoc: Get the non-stack variable comments.
methods.name: getVariableComments

methods.javadoc:
Set the stack variable info for the function
@param vars all function stack variables
methods.name: setStackVarInfo
methods.comment: Set the stack variable info for the function

methods.javadoc:
Set the non-stack variable info for the function
@param vars all function variables
methods.name: setNonStackVarInfo
methods.comment: Set the non-stack variable info for the function

name: CodeUnitInfo
comment:
Container object to keep a relative index, label, and comments. Used
 in a list for copying/pasting labels and comments from one program to
 another.
